meanings.definition: The state or quality of being multiform.
meanings.sent1: The multiformity of the garden's flowers was truly breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The artist's painting showcased a beautiful multiformity of colors and shapes.
meanings.sent3: The multiformity of ice cream flavors at the shop made it hard to choose just one.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe displayed a multiformity of styles, from elegant to casual.
meanings.sent5: The multiformity of cloud shapes in the sky resembled a moving painting.

meanings.definition: The condition of having many different forms or shapes.
meanings.sent1: The multiformity of the crystals in the cave was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: The multiformity of the landscape included mountains, valleys, and rivers.
meanings.sent3: The multiformity of puzzle pieces made it challenging to put them together.
meanings.sent4: The multiformity of buildings in the city created a unique skyline.
meanings.sent5: The multiformity of tree shapes in the forest was like a natural art gallery.
